comments.body: This cleanup code should probably be in a try/finally instead of duplicated top and bottom.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +308,312 @@        if self._play_context.check_mode:
            module_return = dict(changed=True)
            os.remove(zip_path)
            os.removedirs(os.path.dirname(zip_path))
            return module_return

comments.body: This should probably be just `rmdir`- otherwise you could end up inadvertently deleting someone's tempdir if it were empty...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +309,313 @@            module_return = dict(changed=True)
            os.remove(zip_path)
            os.removedirs(os.path.dirname(zip_path))
            return module_return
